Universal Containers (UC) has an approval structure that involves both the Deal Desk and Finance teams. UC wants to send both Approval requests simultaneously when a Quote is submitted to reduce the time for Quote approval.
Which Approval type best suits UC’s needs?

discussion.content: C is right

Selected Answer: C
Multiple chains allows approvals to run in parallel

C. Approval chains run simultaneously in parallel.

https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.cpq_approval_chains.htm&type=5

Selected Answer: C
C is correct.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct.

choices.A: Native Approvals; multiple Approval Processes can be set up to send Approval requests in parallel.
choices.B: Native Approvals; multiple Approval Steps can be set up with the same Step Number to send Approval requests in parallel.
choices.D: Advanced Approvals; multiple Approval Steps can be set up in a single Approval Chain to send Approval requests in parallel.
choices.C: Advanced Approvals; multiple Approval Chains can be set up to send Approval requests in parallel.

The Admin created a Configuration Attribute related to a Product called Bundle Z whose Target Field is Picklist123__c. The Admin selected Bundle Z during Product Selection and populated a value for Picklist123__c on the Configuration Attribute and saved from configuration. The Admin noticed that when Bundle Z is reconfigured, the value populated in the Configuration Attribute has reverted.
How can the Admin ensure the selected value persists in the Configuration Attribute when Bundle Z is reconfigured?
